name: mutton
description: A package for compiling and rendering simple mustache-like templates
author: Austin Kelleher, a@alk.im

scripts.build: yarn compile && cp -R package.json yarn.lock README.md ./dist/src/
scripts.autobuild: yarn build && (cd ./dist/src && yarn install --production && yarn link) && yarn nodemon --exec 'yarn compile' --watch ./src -e ts
